articles.title: Katrina Kaif Gives Glimpse Of Her "American Saturday". Arjun Kapoor Reacts - NDTV
articles.description: Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal are busy holidaying in the US
articles.content:
Katrina Kaif's American Saturday. (courtesy: katrinakaif)
Katrina Kaif is having the time of her life as she holidays in the US, and her recent post stands as proof. The actress gave a glimpse of he… [+1402 chars]
